arts.sum: Joe Champion has provided a score prediction for all 10 matches taking place in LaLiga on Friday, Saturday and Sunday.

arts.ttl: Cesc Fàbregas wants an Espanyol star at Como
arts.sum: Spanish football icon Cesc Fàbregas is eager to bring a member of the defensive ranks at Espanyol to Italy in the near future. That’s according to Mundo Deportivo, citing Diario…

arts.ttl: Report: Bayern Munich would sell Bryan Zaragoza if it can break even financially
arts.sum: According to a report from Sky Sport journalists Kerry Hau (as captured by @iMiaSanMia ), Bayern Munich would be willing to sell off Bryan Zaragoza if it can break even on him — just one year after acquiring the winger: Bayern are willing to sell Bryan Zaragoza in the summer in principle should they get back what they paid for him.

Espanyol were unable to build upon their 3-1 win over Celta Vigo with another victory, and they have now lost five of their last six league outings. Osasuna failed to hold onto their 2-1 lead against...
